net.floodlightcontroller.debugcounter

Interface IDebugCounter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockDebugCounterService.MockCounterImpl

    public interface IDebugCounter
    A concurrent counter. The counter returned when registering a counter. The counter value is a positive long. The counter cannot be decremented, but it can be reset to 0. The counter does not protect against overflow. If the value exceeds MAX_LONG it will silently overflow to MIN_LONG

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(long incr)
      Add the given increment to this counter
      long getCounterValue()
      Retrieve the value of the counter.
      long getLastModified()
      Retrieve the last-modified date of the counter.
      void increment()
      Increment this counter by 1.
      void reset()
      Reset the value of the counter to 0.
